Package com.gwt.ss

Class Summary
GwtExceptionTranslator Rquired Intruduce aop naming space Declare <aop:aspectj-autoproxy> Instantiate this bean 必須 導入 aop 名稱空間 設定 <aop:aspectj-autoproxy> 建立本類別實例
GwtLogoutSuccessHandler Assign to <logout success-handler-ref="hander-reference"/> fot handle logout action.
GwtResponseUtil Utility for handle GWT RPC response.
GwtSessionManagement If you apply Session Management in your secured gwt application,you need to make sure property "proxy-target-class" of <aop:aspectj-autoproxy> set as "false" owing to Spring's proxy mechanism only allow null constructor,unfortunately SessionManagementFilter didn't.
GwtUsernamePasswordAuthority Monitor <form-login> event.
HttpHolder
